creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: black with brown sleeves; very full gored skirt with red trim decorated with orange and red machine stitching and green hand stitching; front loose yoke (sewn to shoulders) and sleeves decorated with colorful geometric embroidery, buttons, coins, metal beads and metal ornaments; long zipper at front of yoke; shorter zipper beneath at neckline of dress
medium: Cotton, silk, buttons, coins, metal beads and ornaments, zippers, gemstones
title: Dress
